Posts.Content: Apr 18, 2017 09:44PM SerenitySeeker35 wrote: Hello, I am 35 and new here. I am currently awaiting tests to comfirm if I have bc. The waiting is driving me crazy but I feel like these boards calm me down. I don't feel alone in my head when I am reading all of your encouraging words. I am wondering... it is somewhat uncommon to get bc under the age of 40, is it not? If you don't mind sharing, how many of you have/had parents or grandparents with bc? I wonder because I don't have bc in my family on either side so I just figured I was safe. Now I am not so sure.
Posts.Title: Enjoying your 30s...and breast cancer! Jsut9802 Ella77
